review: I have been using the Roku HDMI stick for months and love it. I have DSL for internet with a speed of up to 6 Mbps and I have no issues wirelessly streaming HD movies to it. I chose the Roku stick over the Google one because the Roku comes with a remote versus using my laptop to control the unit for the google unit. I bought a second one for another room because of how great it works and its small form factor.
